abstract: Norway's Nina Loseth beats Czech Republic's Sarka Strachova in Santa Caterina Valfurva, Italy to become first Norwegian winner of women’s World Cup slalom in 16 years.
snippet: Nina Loeseth became the first Norwegian winner of a women’s World Cup slalom in 16 years, beating Sarka Strachova of the Czech Republic.
lead_paragraph: Nina Loeseth became the first Norwegian winner of a women’s World Cup slalom in 16 years, beating Sarka Strachova of the Czech Republic.
